headline: Marriott International (MAR): Exploring the Valuation After Recent Share Pullback
summary: If you’re following Marriott International (MAR), you might have noticed the stock sliding a bit this month. There has been no headline-grabbing event, but the dip could make investors wonder whether the market is signaling caution or just presenting a new entry point. Without a clear catalyst behind the recent movement, this softer patch stands out mainly for how it could influence the value conversation around the stock. Despite this month’s pullback, Marriott International is still up 18%...
